description:
A debate show that has gathered 100 otaku is on the air. Shinpachi, the captain of the Tsu Terakado Fan Club, is amongst the participants. As everyone gets into a heated argument over their beliefs, one man has a fierce dispute with Shinpachi. That man is Hijikata who was driven out of the Shinsengumi after being turned into an otaku by the demon sword`s curse. Confronted by a completely different Hijikata, Gintoki and the others learn the demon sword`s terrifying past. Meanwhile, Ito has quickly gained power within the Shinsengumi and the squad members are starting to give off threatening vibes.
Source: crunchyroll
